      promiseInstance.prototype['finally'] = function finallyPolyfill(callback) {
        let constructor = this.constructor;
        return this.then(
          function(value) {
            return constructor.resolve(callback()).then(function() {
              return value;
            });
          },
          function(reason) {
            return constructor.resolve(callback()).then(function() {
              throw reason;
            });
          }
        );
      };
    }
 
    let rethrowError = self => {
      self.then(null, function(err) {
        setTimeout(function() {
          throw err;
        }, 0);
      });
    };

        rethrowError(self);
        return this;

        return this;
      };
    }
